leader. Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain an adviser to Larry Page and Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , as Google's executive chairman. The changes will be effective April 4. operations as CEO. Eric Schmidt will assume the role of Executive Chairman. "I know he( Larry Page ) will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly," Eric Schmidt said in Google blog post. Larry Page will be even better! Larry Page , in my clear opinion, is ready to lead, he continued. As Executive Chairman, Eric Schmidt said he will focus "wherever I can add the greatest value." He will also act as an advisor to Larry Page and Sergey.
